snippet.title: Thumper Gameplay - a Gorgeous, Terrifying New "Rhythm Violence" Experience
snippet.description:
Nominated for Excellence in Audio at the 2015 Independent Games Festival, Thumper exists somewhere between Audiosurf and F-Zero... except terrifying.

Subscribe: http://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=polygon
